text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Type of drain applied to the wound.

purpose.value: This Device resource represents the Product concept of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) MedicalDevice v3.3.1 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicalDevice-v3.3.1(2020EN)) adjusted to the requirements of the [zib Wound v3.3 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Wound-v3.3(2020EN)).
